meanings.sent1: The autarchic ruler made all decisions independently.
meanings.sent2: The country's autarchic policies aimed at self-sufficiency.
meanings.sent3: The autarchic chef insisted on cooking every dish from scratch.
meanings.sent4: Her autarchic nature shone through as she managed the project single-handedly.
meanings.sent5: The autarchic farmer grew his own food and generated his own electricity.

meanings.sent1: The autarchic community relied on its own resources.
meanings.sent2: Her autarchic lifestyle emphasized independence and self-reliance.
meanings.sent3: The autarchic family refused any outside help, even during tough times.
meanings.sent4: The autarchic business thrived by avoiding external dependencies.
meanings.sent5: Living in an autarchic manner, he built his own house and grew his own food.

meanings.sent1: The autarchic was known for his self-sufficiency and independence.
meanings.sent2: She admired the autarchic for his ability to thrive on his own.
meanings.sent3: The autarchic stood out in a world of interdependence and collaboration.
meanings.sent4: Being an autarchic required a strong sense of individualism.
meanings.sent5: The autarchic's determination to be self-reliant inspired others around him.
